Description

Blend Assets Manager (Blasm) is a simple application to allow users of Expression Blend manage available assets: add and remove custom and third-party controls to Blend Assets tab. You just select versions of Blend and platform, choose directoty with your assemblies (for example DevExpress or Telerik components) and make Blend see them.


Functionality

  • Show installed Blend versions and assets groups
  • Add assets to multiple Blend versions, platforms (Silverlight, WPF, Windows Phone) and platform versions
  • Remove Blend assets groups one by one

Requirements

  • Windows XP SP3, Vista, 7, 8, Server
  • .NET Framework 4

Usage

  1. Enter assets group name (can be any name allowed for Windows Registry key)
  2. Select path with assemblies
  3. Choose platforms and versions to install assets for
  4. Click Apply button
  5. Restart Blend if it's running
